title: D2E
content:
A friend told me about this unusual course we could do where we basically try to setup a company and get help from the university of Lyon 3 with classes and mentors. Because I always wanted to be my own boss and work on what I want the three of us applied (my friend, one of his friends and me) and got in!

So since September 2019 we're trying to get IBD off the ground, providing custom websites for any possible needs.

I'll have more to say about the adventure when it is properly finished (and hopefully our partnership isn't).
